resources.string: A short welcome message for customers can make their shopping experience a little bit nicer. However, it is one of the key factors when it comes to increasing your sales.

Shoe Name : %s 
 Company Name : %s

 Description :%s

# The mediocre teacher tells. ...
 # Teaching is more than imparting knowledge, it is inspiring change. ...
 # Much education today is monumentally ineffective. ...
 # I never teach my pupils, I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn. 
 # Learning is more than absorbing facts, it is acquiring understanding.
